apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Spotify Updated to v8.6.42
• Spotilife Updated to v1.8

• Spotify Updated to v8.5.60
• Spotilife Updated to v1.7

apps.versionDescription:
• Spotify Updated to v8.6.42
• Spotilife Updated to v1.8
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ is essentially the same as normal Spotify. Except it is injected with a tweak that activates premium features. There is only one exception: No downloads

So what does Spotify++ offer?

• No Ads
• Unlimited skips
• Play any song or album
• Extreme streaming quality enabled
• No forced shuffle
• Import songs from Music App

apps.name: SoundCloud++
apps.subtitle: SoundCloud with no Ads and extra features.

versions.localizedDescription:
•Updated SoundCloud to v6.16.1
•DarkCloud remains at Latest (v1.4)

• Updated SoundCloud to v6.16.0
• Updated DarkCloud to v1.4

apps.versionDescription:
Updated SoundCloud to v6.16.1
DarkCloud at Latest (v1.4)
apps.localizedDescription:
SoundCloud Injected with DarkCloud - A Tweak that disables Ads and enables the developer menu.

The developer menu includes a wide range of adjustmets the user can make to the app, some include:

• Block audio and video ads
• Enable developer menu
• Hide Go+ tab

Don't worry, the tweaks you would expect (such as no ads) are enabled in the dev menu by default. So just install and enjoy.

apps.name: Instagram++
apps.subtitle: Tweaked Instagram with extra features.

versions.localizedDescription:
Updated Instagram to v269.0
Updated Rocket+ to v3.8.4
Plus+ Remains at latest (v2.5.0)

apps.versionDescription:
Updated Instagram to v269.0
Updated Rocket+ to v3.8.4
Plus+ Remains at latest (v2.5.0)
apps.localizedDescription:
This App comes with 2 Tweaks: Plus and Rocket

Rocket enriches Instagram client with loads of features! Starting from saving posts, reposting, checking if other users follow you and many more.

Feed Enhancements
• Download posts (Videos and Photos)
• Repost posts (Videos and Photos)
• Long press on posts to zoom
• Copy text captions from posts

Stories
• Save stories to Camera Roll
• View stories anonymously
• Manually mark stories as seen
• Mute and unmute video stories
• Upload from Camera Roll (Swipe up)
• Disable auto switch between stories
• Hide stories bar from feed

Profile
• Show if other users follow you
• Long press on profile image to zoom
• Show exact value of numerical stats

Direct Messages
• Disable read receipts
• Save messaged stories to Camera Roll
• Disable screenshot detection in stories

Spoofing (Local Only)
• Verify your profile
• Followers count
• Following count
• Uploads count


Plus for Instagram is a lightweight, and all-in-one tweak crafted to enhance and unlock Instagram's full potential for users. You can do many things that you can't do before on Instagram with this tweak, including ability to stalk person that you love without them knowing!

Features Include:

• See Unsent Direct Message
• Comment Translation
• Focus Mode
• Clean Experience
• Media Downloader
• Watch Story or Live without them knowing!
• Story Video Editor
• Copy Comment Text
• Various Confirmation
• Low Data Mode
• Show Total Likes & Views
• Add Unlimited Accounts
• Full-Resolution Profile Picture
• Disable Quick Reactions
• Unlimited Media Replay (Direct Message)
• Disable Typing... Status (Direct Message)
• Disable Message Marked as Seen (Direct Message)

And More!

news.title: Welcome to WuXu's Library!
news.caption: Welcome to WuXu's Library, an IPA library with an active developer that loves sideloading! WuXu's Library is the most up-to-date altstore source there is, with all tweaks and apps being checked and updated every day.

news.title: Spotify++ Updated - and last for a while
news.caption: Spotify has been updated to v8.6.42 along with Spotilife, now v1.8. Sadly, Spotify has patched Spotilife on all later versions - so it cannot be updated

news.title: SoundCloud++ Updated!
news.caption: SoundCloud++ has been updated to the latest version (v6.16.1), DarkCloud remains at the latest version (v1.4)
